overview: Bishwoshundori is a story about humanity, a story of the triumph of life. The story revolves around Shadhin (Siam Ahmed) and his mother Fatema Ferdousi (Chompa). Because of a disastrous past relationship with X-Miss Bangladesh Ema (Heera), Shadhin has decided not to marry any girl, especially a beautiful girl.
title: Bishwoshundori
